title: Amazing Places to Work
description: Amazing Places to Work illustrates a variety of amazing places that people work. Photographs of workers in their amazing environments will make readers excited to read and learn. Repeated sentence patterns support early emergent readers as they learn about comparing and contrasting as well as plural nouns.
meta: amazing, captain, miner, pilot, ranger, stage
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /w/ sound
Plural Nouns : Recognize and use plural nouns
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word work

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
